messages.content: The sad part about this is that these memes are more Gen Z if anything...
This is something kids do on their twitch streams to get subs, pretty sad.
I'm sad for the bot. They only want a purpose
This hits hard, sadly both of my relationships have been toxic so I've decided not to start any new ones until I start going to uni
Calm down snowflake. Comment stalking from a week ago is really sad, especially when you're whining about something that I'm 100% right on.
I am trying they try to say I’m fake even though I’m trying it’s painful to talk to them sometimes
The fact you have to explain this at the third grade level is pathetic. People think somone preventing his own murder is a tragedy.
My wife is divorcing me because I glued [NAME] face onto all of our family photos He looks good with her body
This is scary and so very sad. Eleven??? A baby! I was still building forts. I weep for this child.
My husband and I have been circling the drain for years. :(
I feel sorry for this little girl. She's legitimely scared.
I'm sad can someone make me feel better Feel like shit rn just want [NAME] back
I'm tired, but I can't sleep.
Yep, she's completely isolated. Part of the abuse.
